Q.1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY* E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE   4. BUCK SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE   5. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE   6. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS OR PRIVATE   0. NO ANSWER

STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE   6. BUCK SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE   7. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 8 8. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS OR PRIVATE   0. NO ANSWER
Q.10. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT YOUR PRESENT CHANCES FOR PROMOTION*    1. VERY WELL SATISFIED   2. FAIRLY WELL SATISFIED   3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED   4. VERY DISSATISFIED   5. UNDECIDED   0. NO ANSWER

Q.11. HOW DO YOU THINK THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE SELECTED FOR PROMOTION*    1. ABILITY   2. BOOTLICKING OR PLAYING POLITICS   3. LUCK   4. BEEN IN THE ARMY A LONG TIME   5. AUTOMATIC ("UP TO T/O LIMITS," "MASS PROMOTION," "UP TO WHATEVER THE JOB CALLS FOR"; LENGTH OF TIME IN GRADE, UNIT, ETC.; OPENINGS IN RATINGS) 4 6. OTHER   7. MISCELLANEOUS   0. NO ANSWER

Q.12. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE RECEIVED OR ARE RECEIVING SUFFICIENT TRAINING FOR THE KINDS OF JOBS YOU HAVE TO DO*    1. HAVE SUFFICIENT TRAINING   2. HAVE NEED FOR MORE TRAINING IN SOME ASPECTS OF MY JOB   3. HAVE NEED FOR MORE TRAINING IN ALL ASPECTS OF MY JOB 9 0. NO ANSWER

Q.13. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE WORK YOU ARE DOING NOW AS COMPARED WITH OTHER JOBS YOU MIGHT BE DOING IN THE ARMY*    1. IT IS AS IMPORTANT AS ANY OTHER JOB I COULD DO   2. IT IS FAIRLY IMPORTANT, BUT I COULD DO MORE IMPORTANT WORK   3. IT HARDLY SEEMS IMPORTANT AT ALL 3 0. NO ANSWER

Q.14. DOES THE ARMY JOB YOU NOW HAVE GIVE YOU A CHANCE TO USE YOUR SKILL AND EXPERIENCE*    1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE   2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE   3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE   4. NO CHANCE AT ALL   5. UNDECIDED 4 0. NO ANSWER
Q.15. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANCE*    1. YES   2. NO   3. UNDECIDED 7 0. NO ANSWER

Q.16. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF WORK YOU HAVE TO DO*    1. I HAVE TOO MUCH TO DO, BUT MOST OF IT IS NECESSARY   2. I HAVE TOO MUCH TO DO AND A LOT OF IT IS UNNECESSARY   3. I HAVE ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF WORK TO DO   4. I AM NOT KEPT VERY BUSY, BUT I DON,T MIND SITTING AROUND   5. I DON,T HAVE ENOUGH TO DO, AND IT GETS PRETTY TIRESOME SITTING AROUND 8 0. NO ANSWER

Q.17. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU LIKE WORKING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB*    1. I REALLY ENJOY MY WORK VERY MUCH   2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL   3. I DISLIKE IT A LITTLE   4. I DISLIKE IT VERY MUCH 6 0. NO ANSWER

Q.18. HAVE YOU EVER SERVED IN THE ARMY OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES IN THIS WAR* Z. EDIT "YES" TO "NO" IF MAN INDICATES THAT HIS ONLY OVERSEAS EXPERIENCE IS PUERTO RICO, BORINQUEN FIELD, OR OTHER SUCH OVERSEAS TRAINING MISSIONS. SOME MEN CALL IT "GYPSY".    1. YES   2. NO 5 0. NO ANSWER
Q.19. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT OR UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WAR*    1. YES   2. NO 4 0. NO ANSWER

Q.20A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT SERVING OVERSEAS*    1. I WANT TO GET OVERSEAS AS SOON AS POSSIBLE   2. I,M READY TO GO WHENEVER I,M NEEDED   3. I,D LIKE TO STAY IN THE U.S. FOR A FEW MONTHS, BUT THEN I,LL BE READY TO GO ANYWHERE   4. I DON,T WANT TO GO OVERSEAS   0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION  B NOT CODED.

Q.22. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR TYPE OF OUTFIT (BASE UNIT, SERVICE GROUP OR BOMBER GROUP) WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WAR*    1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART   2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART   3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART   4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 7 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTING*    1. VERY OFTEN   2. SOMETIMES   3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE   4. NEVER   0. NO ANSWER
Q.24. HOW MANY OF YOUR PRESENT OFFICERS ARE THE KIND THAT ALWAYS TRY TO LOOK OUT FOR THE WELFARE OF ENLISTED MEN*    1. NONE   2. FEW   3. ABOUT HALF   4. MOST   5. ALL   6. DON,T KNOW 9 0. NO ANSWER
Q.25. DO YOU FEEL YOU REALLY BELONG IN YOUR OUTFIT AND ARE AN IMPORTANT PART OF IT*    1. VERY MUCH SO   2. FAIRLY MUCH SO   3. NOT VERY MUCH   4. NOT AT ALL 6 0. NO ANSWER

Q.26. IN GENERAL DO YOU THINK THAT THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR PRESENT OUTFIT GET A SQUARE DEAL FROM THEIR OFFICERS*    1. YES, IN MOST WAYS THEY DO   2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO   3. NO, ON THE WHOLE THEY DO NOT GET A SQUARE DEAL   4. I HAVEN,T BEEN IN THIS OUTFIT LONG ENOUGH TO KNOW 6 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARMY*    1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE   2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO   3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 5 0. NO ANSWER

Q.28. CONSIDERING THEIR RESPONSIBILITIES, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE PRIVILEGES THAT OFFICERS GET COMPARED WITH ENLISTED MEN*    1. FAR TOO MANY PRIVILEGES COMPARED WITH ENLISTED MEN   2. A FEW TOO MANY PRIVILEGES COMPARED WITH ENLISTED MEN   3. ABOUT THE RIGHT NUMBER OF PRIVILEGES   4. TOO FEW PRIVILEGES   0. NO ANSWER

I WOULD RATHER BE STATIONED HERE   2. I WOULD RATHER BE AT THE PLACE I WAS LAST STATIONED   3. IT WOULD MAKE NO DIFFERENCE   4. I HAVE NEVER BEEN STATIONED AT ANY OTHER BASE   0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE MILITARY CONTROL AND DISCIPLINE AT THIS BASE*    1. IT,S TOO STRICT BUT MOST OF IT IS NECESSARY   2. IT,S TOO STRICT AND A LOT OF IT IS UNNECESSARY   3. IT,S ABOUT RIGHT   4. IT,S NOT STRICT ENOUGH   0. NO ANSWER

Q.36. HOW SUCCESSFUL ARE YOUR OFFICERS IN GETTING WILLING AND WHOLE-HEARTED COOPERATION FROM THE MEN*    1. VERY SUCCESSFUL   2. FAIRLY SUCCESSFUL   3. NOT VERY SUCCESSFUL   4. UNSUCCESSFUL   5. NOT SURE 5 0. NO ANSWER

Q.37. DO YOU FEEL YOUR OFFICERS KNOW WHAT YOUR ABILITIES ARE AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO DO*    1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA   2. THEY HAVE A FAIR IDEA   3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT MY ABILITIES 7 0. NO ANSWER
Q.38. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS SEEM TO "KNOW THEIR STUFF"*    1. NONE   2. FEW   3. ABOUT HALF   4. MOST   5. ALL   6. DON,T KNOW 7 0. NO ANSWER

Q.39. WHEN YOU ARE GIVEN A JOB TO DO, ARE YOU TOLD ENOUGH ABOUT IT SO THAT YOU CAN DO A GOOD JOB*    1. ALWAYS TOLD ENOUGH   2. USUALLY TOLD ENOUGH   3. OFTEN NOT TOLD ENOUGH   4. ALMOST NEVER TOLD ENOUGH   0. NO ANSWER
Q.40. DOES THE OFFICER IN CHARGE OF YOUR DEPARTMENT OR SECTION GET AROUND ENOUGH TO KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON AND HOW THE WORK IS BEING DONE*    1. YES   2. NO   0. NO ANSWER
Q.41. ARE YOU USUALLY TOLD WHY THE THINGS YOU DO AND THE THINGS THAT ARE DONE IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE NECESSARY*    1. ALMOST ALWAYS   2. USUALLY   3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME   4. USUALLY NOT 8 0. NO ANSWER

Q.42. DO YOU THINK MOST OF THE FLYING CREWS KNOW HOW MUCH WORK THE MEN ON THE LINE AND IN THE SHOPS HAVE TO DO TO KEEP THE PLANES READY TO FLY*    1. YES, MOST OF THEM DO   2. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO   3. NO, MOST OF THEM DO NOT   0. NO ANSWER

Q.43. YOU WILL PROBABLY WANT TO TAKE A VACATION FIRST OF ALL AFTER YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY. BUT AFTER THAT, WHICH ONE OF THE THINGS BELOW DO YOU THINK YOU ARE MOST LIKELY TO DO* (CHECK ONLY ONE - THE THING YOU THINK YOU ARE MOST LIKELY TO DO FIRST, EVEN IF YOU SHOULD PLAN TO CHANGE TO SOMETHING ELSE AFTERWARD.)    1. WORK FOR AN EMPLOYER, ON SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION   2. GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE   3. FARM   4. HAVE MY OWN BUSINESS   5. I PLAN TO STAY IN THE ARMY   6. I,M UNDECIDED WHAT I WILL DO   7. ALL DOUBLE CHECKS   0. NO ANSWER

GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL   7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH   8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE (EDUCATION BEYOND COLLEGE) 8 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION   NOT CODED.

Q.46. IN GENERAL ARE YOU GLAD YOU ARE IN A B-29 OUTFIT (OR AT A B-29 BASE) OR WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN SOME OTHER TYPE OF OUTFIT*    1. PREFER B-  OUTFIT   2. B-    3. B-    4. ALL OTHER "B,S" (BOMBERS) 4 5. ALL "A" SHIPS, SUCH AS A-  (ATTACK)   6. ALL "P" SHIPS, (PURSUIT OR FIGHTER)   7. ALL OTHER SPECIFIED (MISCELLANEOUS) 6 8. ALL OTHER (NOT SPECIFIED)   9. MAKES NO DIFFERENCE   0. NO ANSWER

OFFICER - ENLISTED MEN RELATIONS WITH REGARD TO JOB SPECIFICALLY (OFFICERS DON,T KNOW STUFF, DON,T LAY OUT WORK WELL, DON,T TELL YOU ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW, DON,T HANDLE CIVILIAN EMPLOYEES PROPERLY)   2. Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. RECREATION NOT ADEQUATE (U.S.O., SERVICE CLUBS, SHOWS, P.X., NOTHING TO DO ON BASE)   2. NOT CHOSEN

Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. WORK SCHEDULES BAD (NEED STANDARDIZED PROCEDURES, HOURS YOU CAN DEPEND ON, NO TIME TO YOURSELF)   2. NOT CHOSEN

Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. LESS CHICKEN-RED TAPE, DETAIL AND ROUTINE; FEWER RESTRICTIONS; MORE PRIVILEGES   2. NOT CHOSEN

Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. COMPLAINT OF OFFICERS BUT NO INDICATION WHETHER COLUMN   OR COLUMN   ABOVE   2. NOT CHOSEN
Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. COMPLAINTS ON RATINGS AND PROMOTIONS; T/O NOT HIGH ENOUGH   2. NOT CHOSEN
Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. MISCELLANEOUS   2. NOT CHOSEN
Q.48. WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WOULD DO THE MOST GOOD TO IMPROVE THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*    1. NO ANSWER OR DON,T KNOW   2. NOT CHOSEN
